cause.description:
FUCK AL GORE... FUCK HYBRIDS... FUCK DEMOCRATS... FUCK GAYS... FUCK CONCERTS DEVOTED TO STOPPING GLOBAL WARMING... FUCK THE POLICE... FUCK CANADA... FUCK HILLARY CLINTON... FUCK PENGUINS...(happy feet is the worst movie ever made) STAY STRONG GLOBAL WARMING!!!!
1. Al Gore must die
2. we must support global warming
3. buy SUV's
cause.mission: cut down trees and burn oil
cause.name: stop trying to stop global warming
